scripts.build-ts: openapi-generator-cli generate -i src/api.yaml -g typescript-fetch --additional-properties=npmName=campaign-composer-api,modelPropertyNaming=original -o dist/typescript && cd dist/typescript && yarn && yarn build
scripts.build-js: openapi-generator-cli generate -i src/api.yaml -g javascript --additional-properties=npmName=campaign-composer-api,modelPropertyNaming=original -o dist/javascript && cd dist/javascript && yarn && yarn build
